original_title: 2006 Globe WCT Fiji: Sickest Event on the Planet
overview: Killer surf and awesome performances once again marked the contest that's fast becoming the gold standard for surf competitions across the globe. Newcomers went head-to-head against big names, and upsets were the order of the day. Interisland rivalries on and off the beach brought a whole new crazy level of competition to this celebrated event that saw Damien Hobgood grab the ultimate glory.
title: 2006 Globe WCT Fiji: Sickest Event on the Planet
